Instruction: In a bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; set aside.
Transfer the zucchini mixture to a baking dish and spread it evenly.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until zucchini is tender and lightly browned.
Bake in the preheated oven until the zucchini chips are soft and the cheese is golden brown, about 15 minutes.
